title: Leveraging wastewater surveillance for managing the spread of SARS-CoV-2 and concerned pathogens during FIFA World Cup Qatar 2022
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Shimaa S. El-Malah, Jayaprakash Saththasivam, Arun K. K, Khadeeja Abdul Jabbar, Tricia A. Gomez, Sara Wahib, Jenny Lawler, Patrick Tang, Faheem Mirza, Hamad Al-Hail, Khalid Ouararhni, Thasni K. Abdul Azis, Laith Jamal Abu Raddad, Hiam S. Chemaitelly, Hussein A. Abu Halaweh, Sara Khalife, Roberto Bertollini, Khaled A. Mahmoud
